# Transaction.AdvancedCommerceInfo.Item

**Structure**

The developer-defined product that was purchased.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Item
```

## Structures

- **Transaction.AdvancedCommerceInfo.Item.Details**: The item details.

## Instance Properties

- **details**: The item’s details.
- **refunds**: The list of refunds that were issued as part of this transaction.
- **revocationDate**: The date access to this item was revoked.

## Structures

- **Transaction.AdvancedCommerceInfo.Offer**: Information about the offer that was redeemed as part of the purchase.
- **Transaction.AdvancedCommerceInfo.Refund**: Information about refunds that were issued as part of this transaction.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
